title: Can you make Tryndamere bad at a stage in the game, instead of him powerhousing in all parts of it?
body:
You know a champion is fucking retarded when you can kill people by right clicking them once and taking your hands off the fucking keyboard.


Level 1, he get's 35% crit chance no matter what, starts e, crit's then e's on to you, ignites and you're either **FORCED** to burn flash or you're just dead. Level 2 he gets sustain, so even if you poke him down he'll just heal right back up, then he gets the AD reducing slow w which makes dueling him nearly fucking impossible, as well as getting away from him, and don't even get me started on the bullshit ultimate of his, where he legit **CANNOT DIE**  which also works with his q, making it to where he gets **MORE AD THE LOWER HEALTH HE IS**. Yeah, I can pick some shit that completely counters him, but he'll just afk farm top lane, get 3 items then 1v3 because with 2 items, he has 85% crit xd. Even if you win a teamfight, the Tryndamere is literally tearing your base up to shit, then once you go up to him, he'll just tower dive you, then run the fuck away. Nice fucking champion design.

replies.body: somebody got their ass beat by tryndamere lel

I think that's not funny.He is asking for advice/help and you sitting there 0 productive and laugh at him.


You have 41% win ratio and you play Tryndamere and Darius.I think that's says enough.

Main Tryndamere laughs at people who cant beat him.

59W 85L 

GGWP

>

> GGWP

he didn't ask for help. he was crying to riot to nerf him. lol.

Don't expect anything from Trynd/Darius players.
Play braindead champs with their only goal being to run the enemy down and then feel superior because of their obnoxious champion kits.
At what stage in the game is Teemo weak? As far as I'm aware, If you press Q and Ctrl+4 you'll have an enemy Tryndamere on the road to a rage quit.
Trynd will just dive him over and over again once he hits 6

Usually, a last hit within Tryndamere's rage, along with about 250AP and {{item:3165}} would be enough for you to walk away from Trynd after popping his ult. Of course, the bad Teemo players would save a Q for this moment and try to 1v1 till his ult is gone.  Just one last hit, and then walk the "path" of escape. It's a real easy game.
Try playing pantheon, everyone on boards say he's op now

If people knew how to counter him early game,and deny him any gold,they wouldn't be complaining so much.


If people spent their time learning how to counter,instead of complaining,this game would have much healthier community.
See what I mean, I don't even gotta say why he's strong he just is apparently lol
Except you cant counter him. The most you can do is not feed and get half the cs you would normally get.

You act like he always has his rage quit. If you harass him as soon as the wave gets there then he won't be able to build it up, then once he does get it he will have to use his Q to heal up, which will take his rage away.

You don't have to fight him when he is ulting. Just kite him for a couple seconds. If you are really having issues against him get a Warden's Mail first thing, which will lower his attack speed when attacking you and give you armor.
Kinda hard to kite Tryndamere when he slows you for running away, then dashes onto you, which gets reduced cooldown every time he crits so

Kiting doesn't just mean running away. When you kite Tryndamere you need to occasionally reface him when you predict the slow. Depends on who you are, but you can walk away, turn towards him, use a skill, walk away more. If he uses his jump on you, you can burst him with your skills (he only has sustained damage, his only damage skill is his jump) and then back off.
So play him if he's so OP.
Whenever someone says this, I wonder if you guys take in consideration what the other player likes to play. Maybe they prefer tanks? Mages?
I'm saying that maybe OP doesn't like playing Trynda, not that we should nerf Trynda.
I like playing shit that's fun, not something that right clicks to win. Sorry, I play a game for the excitement, not something that's dull and good.
so many things beat him in lane. its just carry champs that get shit on by him like yasuo fiora riven

46% winrate.

OP

Nerf.
what do you mean it isn't fun to have lane phase decided by rng, then again even if you do win lane he has amazing sustain through Q so it doesn't really matter
The answer is always karthus.
Pick any champ, whine = boards.
Trynda was for last good in season 3...
I usually ban him when I top because he keeps me from helping my team in team-fights.  Also if your pick is countered by Trynd, it is a snowball and not a stall and defend turret game.

Level 2 he gets sustain, so even if you poke him down he&#039;ll just heal right back up, then he gets the AD reducing slow w which makes dueling him nearly fucking impossible, as well as getting away from him, and don&#039;t even get me started on the bullshit ultimate of his, where he legit **CANNOT DIE**  which also works with his q, making it to where he gets **MORE AD THE LOWER HEALTH HE IS**. Even if you win a teamfight, the Tryndamere is literally tearing your base up to shit, then once you go up to him, he&#039;ll just tower dive you, then run the fuck away. Nice fucking champion design.

Ask your jungler to help you with ganks.Kill him 2-3 times so you get some advantage in gold.

I notice people don't ask their junglers for help at all,which is big mistake.Jungler can't read your mind and act accordingly.You have to ask for help.

If you get killed couple times,do not give up.Farm minions,gear up and push forward.Bait him if you see your jungler coming in,because if you catch him at the middle,he is going to flash/dash

35% crit chance no matter what? Sounds like you didn't keep him off the cs...

Obviously he still needs a full update which is being worked on for direction. However dealing with current tryndamere isn't hard for most top laners. It's just that people who suck at wave control think he's something fearsome.

Not to mention bramble vest and ninja tabi just ends him. It's your own fault for losing to tryn.

Harass him early before he builds up rage. 

He's melee, he shouldn't be getting too much aa harass on you without using E. And if he uses that you most likely win the trade regardless. 

Not trying to be a dick but it seems like you're just bad.

JUST LIKE RENEKTON.
THE MOMENT HE GETS TO THE LANE ATTACK HIM.
IF YOU LET HIM STACK FURRY/RAGE
HE WILL MESS YOU UP.

Tryn has a strong level one and maybe two.

You can completely bully him around after that till one or two items.

Bramble vest shits on him.

This is why we have the boexerpeye build. You rush tiamat to push the waves in and avoid his poor early

>picks literally any ranged champion, or darius. 
boom. lane won.

You seriously want Riot to nerf a champion just because you can't figure out how to play against them?

Here's a tip: Vladimir.
